entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Oxford House

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning early this evening and ending before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Saturday 18 March 2023
